personal.data.tooltip: Gender, name and birthday help us to address you personally and to convey congratulations (optional). For some servcies, e.g. Ticketing we need this data for security reasons. Note: The title "Diverse" can not yet be processed by all connected services.
address.info.tooltip: We do not need your address data until we have to send you something. Therefore, we need it e.g. for the online Shop. If you provide your ZIP code, we can inform you about special events and promotions in your area (optional).
contact.data.tooltip: We need your E-Mail-Address for MEINSTPAULI. Unfortunately, this is required. With your phone number, you can use services like WhatsApp and you can help us with any queries (optional).
